quoteText: You may change Your password at any time. You may also set up a new account and close an old one at Your convenience.
title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time
tosdr.tldr:
The ToS state under "USER ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, AND SECURITY": 
"[...] You may change Your password at any time; You may also set up a new account and close an old one at Your convenience. [...]"
